text:
For DK there's always a way forward! And that way often involves punching stuff.
 
Check out Nintendo Treehouse: Live | Nintendo Switch 2: https://ninten.do/6010qSISo
Sorry, $60 is the best I can do
I have a feeling this game is going to be my entire personality this summer.
DK still punching stuff while Nintendo been punching their fans in the wallet since 1985. Y'all really charging $70 for Mario to jump around like inflation ain't real smh

Okay but can you drop the prices.

hey you should listen to your customers.
This game has nothing to do with Donkey Kong and expecting 80€ for it is an audacity
"It really makes you think outside the box" kinda ironic since you don't really have to think at all by the looks of it.

@NintendoAmerica @Nintendo Your poor treatment of players has gotten out of hand. From going after streamers to charging absurd amounts of money for remakes and ports, you have become more anti-consumer than any other platform. The Switch 2 is now just the Wii U 2.
I love it, but please drop the prices
I would care if I was actually able to get a Switch 2, but the scalpers are already preventing that from happening from a number of UK companies.
